thread.section_title: VON FLOERKE Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von VON FLOERKE | vonfloerke.com
thread.title: Alexander Wennemer
thread.title_full: VON FLOERKE bewertet von Alexander Wennemer

author: Alexander Wennemer
title: Alexander Wennemer
text: I ordered 4 times at Von Floerke. Everytime I was impressed by the products (color, fabric, quality, etc) and also by the speed of their delivery. Think this is going to be my no. 1 Accessoires and Shirt and shoe shop for the years to come. Highly recommendable!
